meta.hint:
Use 'was' if the sentence is about one person, animal, place or thing.
Example - Richard was funny. Example - It was brittle. Example - She was here.
Use 'were' if the sentence is about more than one person, animal, place or thing. Also, use 'were' if the sentence is about you.
Example - Jake and Ron were late. Example - We were behind you. Example - You were so nice.
meta.question: Complete the sentence with the correct past tense form.
